title: Pedagogical Strategies for Motivating English Learning: Blended Learning Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills (daily conversation level)
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing digital devices (tablets/laptops). Requires small-group collaboration spaces for project execution

learning_goals: Learners enhance their sustained motivation for English learning by over 80% using various motivational strategies.
Learners develop and implement self-directed English learning plans utilizing digital tools.
Learners apply strategies to maintain English learning motivation in real-world contexts through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
